strapiPost.title: USL Arkansas Announces First Hire
strapiPost.content:
Yesterday, USL Arkansas announced Wes Harris as the clubâ€™s first official employee, taking on the vital role of Managing Director.

The Man: Harris moved to Northwest Arkansas in 2011, embracing the community as the ideal place to raise his family and call home. His profound love for the area, coupled with a deep understanding of what professional soccer clubs can do for communities, fuels his excitement to bring pro soccer to the region.

The Mission: As Managing Director of USL Arkansas, Harris's role will focus on community engagement, public relations, system and process development, fundraising, and more.

Keep up with USL Arkansas developments HERE.
